column4: hi there....can someone help me with a problem. If I run glxgears I am getting a steady 60fps. However, every flash website / youtube video lags very very badly
turn off vsync what's glxgears show then
probably either that or in your xorg.conf if you have one
sorry mate, bear with me...is that "sync to vblank"? If so...should I turn off all of them? there's a few?
I disabled all 'sync to vblank' now I get around 2879.659 fps...but flash websites are still really laggy
what graphics card/driveer do you have
the driver is the standard linux driver...HOWEVER
after disabling "sync to vblank", should I be logging out and in again?
no logging out/in shouldn't matter...and how taxed is your video card atm?
undecim i said that you can ad it it just won't mount automatically if it's not htere
mate...you linked me to windows applications?
i believe phorenix tests are for linux..
